titleStmt.title: Dumbritons Castle dolefull commendations to all the rascall rogues within thir [sic] nations
titleStmt.author: A. B. C.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "VVe your wretch'd brethren in Dumbriton fort,".
Signed at end: Finis quod A.B.C. Sions friend.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
